org.waarp.common.database

Class DbSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.common.database.DbSession

  • public class DbSession
extends Object
    Class to handle session with the SGBD

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DbSession(DbAdmin admin, boolean isReadOnly)
      Create a session and connect the current object to the server using the DbAdmin object.
      DbSession(DbAdmin admin, boolean isReadOnly, boolean autoCommit)
      Create a session and connect the current object to the server using the DbAdmin object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DbSession

        public DbSession(DbAdmin admin,
                 boolean isReadOnly)
          throws WaarpDatabaseNoConnectionException
        Create a session and connect the current object to the server using the DbAdmin object. The database access use auto commit.

        If the initialize is not call before, call it with the default value.

        Parameters:
        admin -
        isReadOnly -
        Throws:
        WaarpDatabaseSqlException
        WaarpDatabaseNoConnectionException

      • DbSession

        public DbSession(DbAdmin admin,
                 boolean isReadOnly,
                 boolean autoCommit)
          throws WaarpDatabaseNoConnectionException
        Create a session and connect the current object to the server using the DbAdmin object.

        If the initialize is not call before, call it with the default value.

        Parameters:
        admin -
        isReadOnly -
        autoCommit -
        Throws:
        WaarpDatabaseSqlException
        WaarpDatabaseNoConnectionException

        To be called when a client will stop to use this DbSession (once by client)

      • enUseConnectionNoDisconnect

        public final void enUseConnectionNoDisconnect()
        To be called when a client will stop to use this DbSession (once by client). This version is not blocking.
